title: How to Ensure Benefits of AI Reach Everyone? Greek PM Mitsotakis Voices His Concerns | Exclusive
description: Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis, attending the AI Impact Summit in India, emphasised the transformative potential of Artificial Intelligence while recognising the significant risks associated with it., India News, Times Now
content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi welcomes Prime Minister of Greece, Kyriakos Mitsotakis, during the India AI Impact Summit 2026 at the Bharat Mandapam.
Photo : ANI

title: Data center backlash driven over concerns about increases to electricity bills
description: The tech industry’s push to rapidly expand its footprint across the U.S. with sprawling data centers to serve artificial intelligence is running into pushback.

title: AI analyzes ECG to predict ventricular remodeling in patients with repaired tetralogy of Fallot
description: Researchers at the Mount Sinai Kravis Children's Heart Center led a multicenter effort to develop and validate an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that can analyze a standard electrocardiogram (ECG) to identify patients with repaired tetralogy of Fallot who may be at risk for harmful heart changes typically detected by cardiac MRI.
